channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Chat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Chat

item.title: CVE-2017-15892|2024-09-16T16:42:31.922Z -- synology -- chat
item.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Slash Command Creator in Synology Chat before 2.0.0-1124 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) COMMAND, (2) COMMANDS INSTRUCTION, or (3) DESCRIPTION parameter.
